entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.1°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
